00019 #include <stdio.h>
00020 #include <stdlib.h>
00021 #include <math.h>
00022 #include "sqlite3.h"
00023 #include "examinetrips.h"
00024 
00025 double haversine_dist(double latA, double lonA, double latB, double lonB) {
00026     // Haversine formula
00027     // R = earth radius ~= 6,371km
00028     // delta lat = lat2 − lat1
00029     // delta lon = lon2 − lon1
00030     // a = sin2(delta lat/2) + cos(lat1) * cos(lat2) * sin2(delta lon/2)
00031     // c = 2 * atan2(sqrt(a), sqrt(1−a))
00032     // d = R * c
00033 
00034     double R = 6371;
00035     double dlat = latB-latA;
00036     double dlon = lonB-lonA;
00037     double sinlat = sin((dlat/2) * (M_PI/180));
00038     double sinlon = sin((dlon/2) * (M_PI/180));
00039 
00040     double a=sinlat*sinlat + sinlon*sinlon * cos(latA * (M_PI/180)) * cos(latB * (M_PI/180));
00041     double c = 2 * atan2(sqrt(a), sqrt(1-a));
00042     double d = R*c;
00043 
00044     return d;
00045 }
00046 
00047 double petrolusage(sqlite3 *db, int trip) {
00048     int rc;
00049 
00050     const char mafselect_sql[] = "SELECT SUM(a.maf*(a.time-b.time)), count(a.maf), max(a.time) - min(a.time) "
00051             "FROM obd a LEFT JOIN obd b "
00052             "ON a.rowid=b.rowid+1 "
00053             "WHERE a.trip=? AND b.trip=a.trip";
00054 
00055     sqlite3_stmt *mafstmt;
00056 
00057     rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, mafselect_sql, -1, &mafstmt, NULL);
00058     if(SQLITE_OK != rc) {
00059         fprintf(stderr, "Cannot prepare select statement maf (%i): %s\n", rc, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00060         return -1;
00061     }
00062 
00063     sqlite3_bind_int(mafstmt, 1, trip);
00064     printf("Trip %i ", trip);
00065 
00066     double trip_dist = tripdist(db, trip);
00067     double total_maf;
00068     double delta_time;
00069     int maf_count;
00070     if(SQLITE_ROW == sqlite3_step(mafstmt)) {
00071         total_maf = sqlite3_column_double(mafstmt,0);
00072         maf_count = sqlite3_column_int(mafstmt,1);
00073         delta_time = sqlite3_column_double(mafstmt,2);
00074     }
00075 
00076     /* const float ratio = 0.147;
00077     const float petrol_density = 737.22; //  kg/m^3
00078     const float cubic_meters_to_gallons = 264.172052;
00079     const float km_to_miles = 0.621371192;
00080 
00081     double petrol_kilograms = ratio * total_maf / 1000.0;
00082     double petrol_m3 = petrol_kilograms/petrol_density;
00083     double petrol_gal = petrol_m3 * cubic_meters_to_gallons;
00084 
00085     double trip_miles = trip_dist * km_to_miles;
00086 
00087     printf("(%.0f sec): %.2fg petrol, %.3fgal, %.2fmiles, %.1fmpg\n",
00088                 delta_time, 1000*petrol_kilograms,
00089                 petrol_gal, trip_miles, trip_miles/petrol_gal);
00090     */
00091 
00092     // Magic. http://www.mp3car.com/vbulletin/engine-management-obd-ii-engine-diagnostics-etc/75138-calculating-mpg-vss-maf-obd2.html
00093     const double magic_number = 710.7; 
00094 
00095     double average_speed = trip_dist/(delta_time/3600);
00096     double average_maf = total_maf/(delta_time/3600);
00097 
00098     double mpg = magic_number * average_speed / (average_maf/100);
00099 
00100     printf("%.3fmaf, %.3fkm/h, %.0f sec, %.2fkm, %.1fmpg\n", average_maf, average_speed, delta_time, trip_dist, mpg);
00101 
00102     sqlite3_finalize(mafstmt);
00103 
00104     return total_maf;
00105 }
00106 
00107 double tripdist(sqlite3 *db, int trip) {
00108     int rc;
00109 
00110     double total_dst = 0;
00111 
00112     const char dstselect_sql[] = "SELECT a.lat,a.lon,b.lat,b.lon "
00113             "FROM gps a LEFT JOIN gps b "
00114             "ON b.rowid=a.rowid+1 "
00115             "WHERE a.trip=? AND b.trip=a.trip";
00116 
00117     sqlite3_stmt *dststmt;
00118 
00119     rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, dstselect_sql, -1, &dststmt, NULL);
00120     if(SQLITE_OK != rc) {
00121         fprintf(stderr, "Cannot prepare select statement dst (%i): %s\n", rc, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00122         return -1;
00123     }
00124 
00125     sqlite3_bind_int(dststmt, 1, trip);
00126 
00127     while(SQLITE_ROW == sqlite3_step(dststmt)) {
00128         total_dst += haversine_dist( sqlite3_column_double(dststmt, 0),
00129                             sqlite3_column_double(dststmt, 1),
00130                             sqlite3_column_double(dststmt, 2),
00131                             sqlite3_column_double(dststmt, 3) );
00132     }
00133 
00134     sqlite3_finalize(dststmt);
00135 
00136     return total_dst;
00137 }
00138 
00139 int tripmeanmedian(sqlite3 *db, int trip, double *meanlat, double *meanlon,
00140     double *medianlat, double *medianlon) {
00141 
00142     int rc;
00143 
00144     const char dstselect_sql[] = "SELECT a.lat,a.lon,b.lat,b.lon "
00145             "FROM gps a LEFT JOIN gps b "
00146             "ON b.rowid=a.rowid+1 "
00147             "WHERE a.trip=? AND b.trip=a.trip";
00148 
00149     sqlite3_stmt *dststmt;
00150 
00151     rc = sqlite3_prepare_v2(db, dstselect_sql, -1, &dststmt, NULL);
00152     if(SQLITE_OK != rc) {
00153         fprintf(stderr, "Cannot prepare select statement dst (%i): %s\n", rc, sqlite3_errmsg(db));
00154         return -1;
00155     }
00156 
00157     sqlite3_bind_int(dststmt, 1, trip);
00158 
00159     double total_lat = 0;
00160     double total_lon = 0;
00161 
00162     int count = 0;
00163 
00164     double total_len = 0;
00165 
00166     while(SQLITE_ROW == sqlite3_step(dststmt)) {
00167         double latA = sqlite3_column_double(dststmt, 0);
00168         double lonA = sqlite3_column_double(dststmt, 1);
00169         double latB = sqlite3_column_double(dststmt, 2);
00170         double lonB = sqlite3_column_double(dststmt, 3);
00171 
00172         double delta = haversine_dist( latA, lonA, latB, lonB );
00173 
00174         total_len += delta;
00175 
00176         total_lat += delta * latA;
00177         total_lon += delta * lonA;
00178 
00179         count++;
00180     }
00181 
00182     sqlite3_reset(dststmt);
00183 
00184     double half_len = total_len / 2;
00185     while(SQLITE_ROW == sqlite3_step(dststmt)) {
00186         double latA = sqlite3_column_double(dststmt, 0);
00187         double lonA = sqlite3_column_double(dststmt, 1);
00188         double latB = sqlite3_column_double(dststmt, 2);
00189         double lonB = sqlite3_column_double(dststmt, 3);
00190 
00191         double delta = haversine_dist( latA, lonA, latB, lonB );
00192 
00193         half_len -= delta;
00194 
00195         if(half_len < 0) {
00196             *medianlat = latA;
00197             *medianlon = lonA;
00198             break;
00199         }
00200     }
00201 
00202     sqlite3_finalize(dststmt);
00203 
00204     if(count == 0 || total_len == 0) {
00205         fprintf(stderr, "Trip % i had no points; can't calculate weighted mean\n", trip);
00206         return -1;
00207     }
00208 
00209     *meanlat = total_lat / total_len;
00210     *meanlon = total_lon / total_len;
00211 
00212     return 0;
00213 }
